reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly mentions the collection of personal and non-personal identification information from users.
reply.reference: We may collect personal identification information from Users... We may collect non-personal identification information about Users... URL: https://www.ohealthappsstudio.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects non-personal identification information such as browser name, computer type, technical information about means of connection, operating system, and Internet service providers.

content: Technical information about means of connection

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that non-personal identification information is collected, including specific details such as browser name, computer type, operating system, etc.
reply.reference: Non-personal identification information may include the browser name, the type of computer, and technical information about Users means of connection to our Site, such as the operating system and the Internet service providers utilized and other similar information. URL: https://www.ohealthappsstudio.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can unsubscribe from receiving future emails or contact the Site directly to opt out of data collection or delete their data.
reply.reference: If at any time the User would like to unsubscribe from receiving future emails, we include detailed unsubscribe instructions at the bottom of each email or the User may contact us via our Site. URL: https://www.ohealthappsstudio.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: No, the app does not share personal identification information with third parties. However, generic aggregated demographic information may be shared with business partners, trusted affiliates, and advertisers.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app does not sell, trade, or rent personal identification information to third parties. Only generic aggregated demographic information may be shared with specific entities for outlined purposes.
reply.reference: We do not sell, trade, or rent Users personal identification information to others. We may share generic aggregated demographic information not linked to any personal identification information regarding visitors and users with our business partners, trusted affiliates, and advertisers for the purposes outlined above. URL: https://www.ohealthappsstudio.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with business partners, trusted affiliates, advertisers, and third-party service providers.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions that the app may share information with business partners, trusted affiliates, advertisers, and third-party service providers for limited purposes with user permission.
reply.reference: We may share generic aggregated demographic information not linked to any personal identification information regarding visitors and users with our business partners, trusted affiliates, and advertisers for the purposes outlined above. We may use third-party service providers to help us operate our business and the Site or administer activities on our behalfs, such as sending out newsletters or surveys. We may share your information with these third parties for those limited purposes provided that you have given us your permission. URL: https://www.ohealthappsstudio.com/privacy-policy/
